price: Sesungguhnya Allah menumbuhkan butir tumbuh-tumbuhan dan biji buah-buahan.  Dia mengeluarkan yang hidup dari yang mati dan mengeluarkan yang mati dari yang hidup. (Yang memiliki sifat-sifat) demikian ialah Allah, maka mengapa kamu masih berpaling?
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ فَالِقُ ٱلۡحَبِّ وَٱلنَّوَىٰۖ يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡحَيَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ وَمُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ مِنَ ٱلۡحَيِّۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha fāliqu al-ḥabi wal-nawā yukh'riju al-ḥaya mina al-mayiti wamukh'riju al-mayiti mina al-ḥayi dhālikumu al-lahu fa-annā tu'fakūna
